name: Commonwealth ex rel. Gist, Appellant, v. Banmiller
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Gist v. Banmiller

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Boic and McBride, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Gist, Appellant, v. Banmiller.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the Court of Common Pleas No. 2 of Philadelphia County in this matter is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Waters.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Edward Gist, appellant, in propria persona.
Charles L. Durham and Dómemele Vitullo, Assistant District Attorneys, Paul M. Chai fin, First Assistant District Attorney, and Victor H. Blanc, District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Gist, Appellant, v. Banmiller.
January 18, 1960:
Submitted November 11, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Boic and McBride, JJ.
Edward Gist, appellant, in propria persona.
Charles L. Durham and Dómemele Vitullo, Assistant District Attorneys, Paul M. Chai fin, First Assistant District Attorney, and Victor H. Blanc, District Attorney, for appellee.
